entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cardston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cardston 06:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Fog. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Fog becoming fog patches late this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
